item.bloodsmeltery.guide_book: A Blood Mage's Guide To Smelting
item.bloodsmeltery.guide_book.tooltip:
The complete guide to bloodforging and runecasting.
by P. William Bloodstone
block.bloodsmeltery.bloodbrass_block.too: Can be used as beacon base
desc.bloodsmeltery.willmelting: Produces %s mb per point of Will Quality.
desc.bloodsmeltery.tartariccasting: Adds 1 point of Will Quality to the item.
desc.bloodsmeltery.willcompat: This recipe may work for other items that hold Demon Will.
modifier.bloodsmeltery.sentient.descript: Becomes more powerful the more Demon Will you carry
modifier.bloodsmeltery.divination.descri: Shows more information for the blood altar, shows current lp on use.
recipe.bloodsmeltery.modifier.divination: Divination II requires a different recipe than the first level
modifier.bloodsmeltery.bloodstained.flav: Made from the blood of your... enemies?
modifier.bloodsmeltery.bloodstained.desc: Repairs itself using lp from your soul network.
modifier.bloodsmeltery.exsanguinate.desc: Adds lp to your soul network whenever you kill a monster
